item.title: Add apt repository for Fish and Emacs
item.description: Table of Contents Command to be use No this command? Do this first Process Register repository Refresh repository Installation Command to be use add-apt-repository No this command? Do this first apt install software-properties-common Process Register repository add-apt-repository ppa:kelleyk/emacs apt-add-repository ppa:fish-shell/release-3 Refresh repository apt update Installation apt install emacs26 apt install fish
